discourse_list.title: Third OP Governance Call August 30th and Looking for Future Hosts!

content.content: Hi everyone, we have our third governance call scheduled for next Tuesday, August 30th at 10am PT/1pm ET, 7pm CET. The meeting details and agenda are below. The call is open to anyone in the OP Community to join. We will have a discussion segment for governance committees so it would be great to hear from some of the members in the proposed committees!  @OPUser @MoneyManDoug @Gonna.eth @jackanorak @solarcurve @SEED_LATAM_Joxes @MinimalGravitas @krzkaczor @lefterisjp @jrocki.eth I put together a sign up sheet for anyone that would like to facilitate future calls here.  Please sign up to host a call!  I also put together a presentation template here for any host to use in the future  Agenda  Previous voting cycle Current governance cycle Upcoming governance cycle Open Discussion - Governance Committees   Defi Committees A, B, C     Tooling     NFT and Gaming   Open Discussion - General  Meeting Info    Zoom Video   Join our Cloud HD Video Meeting Zoom is the leader in modern enterprise video communications, with an easy, reliable cloud platform for video and audio conferencing, chat, and webinars across mobile, desktop, and room systems. Zoom Rooms is the original software-based conference...      Meeting ID: 964 3417 4431 Passcode: 368400
Thank you for all your hard work facilitating these Katie
Looking forward to the call! Also, I’m down to host the next one! I just requested access to the schedule.
Awesome!! Just shared with you, thank you so much for being the first volunteer
I have a reoccurring meeting each week at my day job that conflicts with the last half hour of our scheduled time or else I would 100% facilitate one

katie:  We will have a discussion segment for governance committees so it would be great to hear from some of the members in the proposed committees!   Adding a few more @linda @GFXlabs @Bobbay_StableLab @fig @mastermojo @ScaleWeb3 @ceresstation @Butterbum @FractalVisions
Thanks Katie, I will be joining the governance call tomorrow.

Thank you to everyone that joined the third governance call!  Topics discussed and the recording link are below.  @Michael will be hosting the next call!  If you would like to host a future call, you can sign up here. Topics Discussed  Participating in multiple governance committees Should potential committee members abstain from voting on their own proposals and in their proposal category Potential issues with employees on defi projects being on committees What constitutes a conflict of interest Do abstain votes go towards quorum vote Issues with committees having too much voting power Overall benefits of governance committees  Recording   Zoom Video Communications    Video Conferencing, Web Conferencing, Webinars, Screen Sharing Zoom is the leader in modern enterprise video communications, with an easy, reliable cloud platform for video and audio conferencing, chat, and webinars across mobile, desktop, and room systems. Zoom Rooms is the original software-based conference...       Passcode: *0$.g2LK
Thanks for hosting the call, Katie. I had lots of fun & received much value. Hopefully with Michael taking over next time you have started an OP Governance rolling snowball!

Do abstain votes go towards quorum vote? Per OP team It is not specified exactly in the Operating Manual whether the ‘abstain’ vote is included in the quorum, but the final result is based only on “For/Against” votes. Most likely ‘Abstain’ votes are included in the quorum, but does not influence the results of the vote. ‘Approval threshold: The minimum number of OP votes required to be cast in favor of approving a proposal. The approval threshold for each proposal is measured as % of votes cast to approve relative to the total number of votes cast in connection with a proposal.’ Link Discord
